infoModal.title: Why is all this data necessary?
infoModal.content1: According to local legislation, authorities require owners/hosts of tourist accommodation to keep a record of all guests who visit their properties. The authorities expect a minimum of mandatory personal data from you which you must provide them.
infoModal.content2: Completing the online check-in before your arrival saves you time, as the host will have to enter your details upon arrival, which could take longer.
infoModal.content3: All data is processed in accordance with the General Data Protection Regulation. More information about our privacy policy.

contract.title: 1. Contract Purpose
contract.content: This contract concerns the rental of a property for a determined period. The guest agrees to respect the house rules throughout the duration of the stay.

arrival.title: 2. Arrival and Departure
arrival.guestNotify: The guest commits to inform the host of their approximate arrival time at least 24 hours in advance.
arrival.departure: Departure must be completed within the agreed timeframe.

behavior.title: 3. Behavior and Respect of Premises
behavior.noise: The guest commits to respect the neighborhood's tranquility and avoid excessive noise, particularly during quiet hours.
behavior.care: The guest agrees to take care of the accommodation and its equipment. Any damage or loss will be charged to the guest.
behavior.smoking: Smoking is strictly forbidden inside the accommodation. Smoking areas may be available outside (if applicable).
behavior.pets: Pets are only allowed upon prior request and with written agreement from the host.

facilities.title: 4. Use of Facilities
facilities.usage: The guest commits to use the accommodation's equipment according to the instructions provided by the host. In case of malfunction, the guest must immediately inform the host.
facilities.responsibility: The guest assumes responsibility for any misuse of equipment, which could result in additional charges.

cleanliness.title: 5. Cleanliness
cleanliness.maintain: The guest commits to keeping the accommodation clean and tidy during their stay.
cleanliness.service: Cleaning service is included in the rental. However, additional charges may apply if the accommodation is left in an excessively dirty state.

security.title: 6. Security
security.lock: The guest commits to locking all doors and windows of the accommodation when leaving the premises.
security.emergency: In case of emergency (fire, water leak, etc.), the guest must immediately contact the host and/or relevant emergency services.

morocco.title: 7. Respect of Moroccan Laws
morocco.laws: The guest commits to respecting Moroccan laws, particularly those governing tourist accommodation and behavior in public spaces.
morocco.consequences: In case of non-compliance with Moroccan laws or the rules stated in this contract, the host reserves the right to terminate the rental without refund and report the incident to competent authorities.

internet.title: 8. Internet Usage
internet.content: Internet access is provided free of charge. The guest commits to using it legally and respectfully. Any illegal online activity is strictly prohibited.

disputes.title: 9. Dispute Resolution
disputes.content: In case of dispute, the host and guest commit to attempting an amicable resolution. If this is not possible, the dispute will be settled according to Moroccan law.

cancellation.title: 10. Cancellation and Modifications
cancellation.content: Cancellation and modification conditions of the reservation are specified at the time of booking and are governed by the terms of this contract.

unauthorized.title: 11. Prohibition of Unauthorized Guests
unauthorized.content: The guest commits to not hosting or accommodating persons not mentioned in the initial reservation without prior written agreement from the host. Any undeclared additional person may result in additional charges, immediate cancellation of the reservation without refund, and/or legal measures in accordance with Moroccan law.

signature.title: Electronic Signature
signature.content: By signing this contract, the guest acknowledges having read the terms of these house rules and commits to respecting all stated conditions.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: This Privacy Policy explains how Trevio collects, uses, stores, and protects your personal information when you use our services to book and stay at properties listed on our platform.

personal.subtitle: Personal Information
personal.content: We collect personal information you provide when creating a reservation, including your name, email address, phone number, date of birth, nationality, and residence address.

identification.subtitle: Identification Documents
identification.content: In accordance with local laws and regulations, we collect copies of identification documents (passport, national ID, etc.) for guest registration purposes.

booking.subtitle: Booking Information
booking.content: We collect information about your reservations, including check-in/check-out dates, property preferences, and special requests.

communication.subtitle: Communication Data
communication.content: We collect information from communications between you, us, and property hosts, including messages and support interactions.

dataUse.title: How We Use Your Information
purposes: Verify your identity as required by local laws
Communicate with you about your booking
Comply with legal and regulatory requirements
Send important updates about your reservation

hosts.subtitle: With Property Hosts
hosts.content: We share necessary booking and guest information with property hosts to facilitate your stay and ensure legal compliance.

authorities.subtitle: With Authorities
authorities.content: We may share information with local authorities when required by law, particularly for guest registration and tax compliance.

services.subtitle: With Service Providers
services.content: We share information with trusted service providers who help us operate our platform and provide services to you.

security.subtitle: Security Measures
security.content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction.

retention.subtitle: Data Retention
retention.content: We retain your personal information only as long as necessary for the purposes described in this policy or as required by law.

encryption.subtitle: Data Encryption
encryption.content: All sensitive data is encrypted both in transit and at rest using industry-standard encryption protocols.

yourRights.title: Your Rights
yourRights.content: Under applicable data protection laws, you have the right to:
rights: Object to processing of your data

cookies.title: Cookies and Tracking
cookies.content: We use cookies and similar technologies to improve your experience on our platform. You can control cookie settings through your browser preferences.

legalBasis.title: Legal Basis for Processing
legalBasis.content: We process your personal information based on:

childrenPrivacy.title: Children's Privacy
childrenPrivacy.content: Our services are not intended for children under 16 years of age. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 16.

contact.title: Contact Information
contact.content: If you have questions about this Privacy Policy or wish to exercise your rights, please contact us at:

changes.title: Changes to This Policy
changes.content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any material changes by email or through our platform.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Find answers to the most frequently asked questions about Trevio
faq.noResults: No results found for your search.

general.question: What is Trevio?
general.answer: Trevio is a comprehensive digital concierge and rental management platform that streamlines the entire rental lifecycle from property listing to guest check-out, with specialized features for electronic access management and legal compliance.

general.question: How does Trevio work?
general.answer: Property owners list their properties on Trevio, manage reservations, create digital contracts with guests, and use our electronic lock system for secure keyless access. Guests receive digital guidebooks and can complete check-in processes online.

general.question: Is Trevio available in multiple languages?
general.answer: Yes, Trevio supports both English and French interfaces to serve our diverse user base.

booking.question: How do I create a reservation?
booking.answer: Go to the Reservations section, click 'Create New Reservation', select your property, choose dates, set pricing, and add guest details. The system will generate a contract for the guest to complete.

booking.question: Can I sync my calendar with other platforms?
booking.answer: Yes, you can sync your calendar with Airbnb, Booking.com, and other platforms using iCal links to prevent double bookings.

booking.question: What happens after I create a reservation?
booking.answer: Once created, you can generate a contract and send it to the guest. The guest will receive an email with a link to complete their registration and sign the contract digitally.

booking.question: Can I modify a reservation after it's created?
booking.answer: Yes, you can edit reservation details such as total price before the contract is completed. Once signed, major changes require creating a new reservation.

property.question: How do I add a new property?
property.answer: Click 'Add Property' in the Properties section. Complete the multi-step form including basic information, photos, amenities, house rules, and check-in/check-out details. Properties require admin approval before being published.

property.question: What are digital guidebooks?
property.answer: Digital guidebooks provide guests with comprehensive information about your property, including check-in instructions, house rules, amenities, and nearby attractions. They're automatically generated from your property details.

property.question: How do I manage property equipment cards?
property.answer: In the Property Management section, you can create equipment cards for WiFi, appliances, and other amenities. Each card can include instructions, photos, or videos to help guests use the equipment properly.

property.question: Can I assign properties to managers?
property.answer: Yes, you can invite concierges/managers and assign specific properties to them. They'll have access to manage assigned properties, reservations, and guest communications.

guest.question: How do guests complete check-in?
guest.answer: Guests receive an email link to complete their registration online. They provide personal information, upload ID documents, and sign the rental contract electronically before arrival.

guest.question: What is the electronic lock system?
guest.answer: Our electronic lock system allows secure keyless access. You can generate access codes for each reservation that work only during the guest's stay period.

guest.question: Can guests access property information?
guest.answer: Yes, guests receive access to a digital guidebook with property details, check-in instructions, house rules, and information about nearby attractions and services.

guest.question: How do guests sign contracts?
guest.answer: Contracts are signed electronically through our platform. Guests can review terms, provide their information, and sign with a digital signature on any device.

technical.question: What browsers are supported?
technical.answer: Trevio works best on modern browsers including Chrome, Firefox, Safari, and Edge. Mobile devices are fully supported with responsive design.

technical.question: How do I reset my password?
technical.answer: Click 'Forgot Password' on the login page, enter your email, and follow the instructions in the reset email. You'll receive a verification code to create a new password.

technical.question: Can I access Trevio on mobile devices?
technical.answer: Yes, Trevio is fully responsive and optimized for mobile devices. You can manage properties, reservations, and guest communications from your smartphone or tablet.

technical.question: What if I encounter technical issues?
technical.answer: Contact our support team through the platform or email support@trevio.ma. Provide details about the issue and any error messages you're seeing.

billing.question: How does Trevio pricing work?
billing.answer: Contact our sales team for detailed pricing information based on your needs. We offer various plans depending on the number of properties and features required.

billing.question: Can I track revenue through Trevio?
billing.answer: Yes, our revenue tracking system allows you to record and analyze property income by month and year, with detailed reporting and visualization tools.

billing.question: Are there any setup fees?
billing.answer: Setup fees vary depending on your plan and requirements. Contact our sales team for a personalized quote.

contactSupport.title: Still need help?
contactSupport.description: Can't find what you're looking for? Our support team is here to help.

chatbot.title: Trevio Chatbot
chatbot.subtitle: Your AI Assistant for Property Management
chatbot.welcomeMessage: Welcome to Trevio Chatbot! You can chat with me in any language. Just note that I can only speak in English through voice.
chatbot.connectionError: Sorry, I'm having trouble connecting. Please try again.
